question: Find the radian expression for angle I-O1-J.
qt_description: Angle I-O1-J by Line_O1_I & Line_J_O1 at O1 (New edges: 1=False, 2=False) (Expr Length: 4)
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 8-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 10, rotation angle pi/8 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed circle (center O1) around 8-sided polygon. Round 2: applying 'vertex_on_center' rule. Vertex-on-center derivation: 3-gon (center O2) with side length equal to base 8-gon side. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 9 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 11, total arcs: 10, total points: 13.
增强结果序号: 2/4
本结果操作轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect points C and A (both on segments)
generated_question: In the given diagram, a regular octagon with side length 10 is inscribed in a circle centered at O1. Points A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H are the vertices of the octagon in counterclockwise order. A triangle I-J-O2 is constructed such that O2 is the center of a new equilateral triangle with side length equal to that of the octagon, and points I and J lie on the circle centered at O1. Line segments O1-I and O1-J are drawn, forming angle ∠I-O1-J at the center O1. Given that the octagon is rotated by π/8 radians relative to the standard position, and that point C is connected to point A (both vertices of the octagon), determine the radian measure of angle ∠I-O1-J.
